ChappelGalleries.title: Chappel Galleries
ChappelGalleries.text: Chappel Galleries is a long-standing commercial gallery of modern and contemporary art. Throughout 2020 and 2021, we produced a series of five videos for their exhibitions. We recorded, edited, and colour graded the videos in-house. Each video contained an original score, interviews with the artists, and documentation of the gallery and the work on display.

links.text: Watch videos on Chappel Galleries' website

AutonomicsResearchCentre.title: Autonomics Research Centre
AutonomicsResearchCentre.text: The Autonomics Research Centre is an art and academic research collective. We provided UI/UX design, website development and creative direction for their online presence and published output.

JohnHounam.title: John Hounam Fine Art
JohnHounam.text: John Hounam is a visual artist based in Oxford, UK. We developed his website, which displays a varied portfolio of watercolours, paintings, drawings and video work.

HelenHoward.title: Helen Howard Ceramics
HelenHoward.text: Helen Howard is a ceramic and drawing artist whose work is inspired by observations of the natural world. We developed Helenâ€™s website, which displays collections of Raku-fired pots, drawings and information about her work.

IsabelKnowland.title: Isabel Knowland Fine Art
IsabelKnowland.text: Isabel Knowland is a multidisciplinary artist working in sculpture, painting, installation, and printmaking. We designed and developed her website to organise her collections of work and grow her online presence.
